displayName.text: Matt Martin - Lic Assoc Real Estate Broker

authorAttributions.displayName: Matt Martin - Lic Assoc Real Estate Broker

adrFormatAddress: 831 Broadway, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Matt was great in helping my cousin and I find a affordable apartment for rent in NYC. He put our minds at easy and helped minimize the stress of apartment hunting in the city. He was very cognizant of our needs and what we were looking for including being knowledge of the market and explaining to us the process of renting in the city. We appreciate how patient he was when working with us and answering all our questions. He is a efficient communicator and responds quickly. He was super friendly and it was a pleasure meeting him in person when he showed us apartments in the city. Overall, Matt was awesome!

text.text: Matt was great in helping my cousin and I find a affordable apartment for rent in NYC. He put our minds at easy and helped minimize the stress of apartment hunting in the city. originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Matt when selling my apartment. Thanks to his great work, we were able to secure an offer at the amount significantly above a listing price (also at the record selling price in my building!) right after the first open house Matt had organized. He was not only very knowledgeable, personable, and endlessly patient, but also incredibly generous with his time in explaining the entire process to me. As a first-time home seller, I was tremendously grateful for his guidance. During that time, I had to deal with some health problems, and Matt handled any bumps in the road we encountered before the closing, making this process anxiety-free for me. Matt is just a very sincere person who would go miles to make things happen for his clients. I can’t recommend him highly enough. Thank you Matt!

originalText.text: Matt helped me tremendously in finding an apartment that I actually wanted in an area that was right for me. Often times brokers (also my relocation destination service) just try to get the deal done without taking proper care of their client - NYC is just perfect for this. Matt asked many questions and had great advise and tips of what would suit me and my needs. Even when I had already moved in and still had a couple of questions he made sure these were addressed in a timely fashion. I can 100% recommend and would definitely work with him again.

originalText.text:
Matt helped me find a beautiful home in Boerum hill/downtown BK. He was honest, thoughtful, super detailed and organized, followed up relentlessly when crunch time came, and ensured I got exactly what I needed every step of the way. He also handled my very exacting parents' questions with grace ;).
He is a pleasure to work with, and will ensure you find a home you truly love and can afford. I'd recommend Matt to all my friends looking to upgrade into their next phase of living in NY!

He is a pleasure to work with, and will ensure you find a home you truly love and can afford. I'd recommend Matt to all my friends looking to upgrade into their next phase of living in NY!

originalText.text: Matt is excellent! As a first time buyer navigating the New York City market he walked me through the unknowns, talked me down to reality when needed and empathized with my needs. He is thoughtful, diligent and easy to get along with. I truly enjoyed working with him and almost sad I found a place and don't get to spend more time with him! Strongly recommend.
